catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Pretty Polkadots Sundress
catentdesc.longdescription: An adorable sleeveless dress perfect for a warm summer day. Made of 100% cotton, with a colorful polkadot pattern, this sundress feels great and looks stylish, too! Enclosed with zipper at back.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Girls' Pink Sundress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' pink sundress with flower embellishment
catentdesc.longdescription: A charming summer dress, made of 100% cotton. She will look pretty all dressed up in this Gusso Kidswear sundress with straps at the shoulder, ribboned waist, and flower embellishment!

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Dress with Rossettes
catentdesc.longdescription: Pretty as a princess! She 'll look so sweet in this beautiful mid-length white dress with a babydoll sihouette, capped sleeves, and rossette embellishments.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Girls' Black&White Polkadot Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' black & white polkadot dress with pink ribbon
catentdesc.longdescription: Stylish and totally charming for the fashion-forward girl. This Hermitage sleeveless dress in classic black and white will look fabulous on her! Pretty pink ribbon at the waist adds just the right touch.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Girls' Denim Overall Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' denim overall dress with large pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: Casual and comfortable, this above the knee denim overall dress from Gusso Kidswear looks and feels great. Large pockets and metal clasps give this dress a bit of flair.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Skirt with Small Polkadots
catentdesc.longdescription: So sweet! This adorable skirt with a playful polkadot skirt is perfect for everyday wear and is made of an easy-to-care-for polyester fabric.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Toddler Summer Dress
catentdesc.longdescription: This delightful toddler dress from the Versatil Spring Collection is perfect for playing in the sunshine and picking flowers! She will look so cute!

catentdesc.name: Gusso Kidswear Girls' Jean Skirt
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' Western style jean skirt with ruffled hem
catentdesc.longdescription: With an adorable ruffled hem, your little cowgirl will look precious in this Western-style jean skirt from Gusso. Made of prewashed denim, so it feels soft and comfortable.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Toddler Girls' Striped Dress with Flower
catentdesc.longdescription: Delightful cotton toddler dress, with white bib top and pleated blue and white striped skirt. Flower embellishment adds to the charm, while the buttery soft brushed cotton will this dress her favortite.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girl'S Pleated Striped and Floral Skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Pretty pleated mid-length striped skirt from Albini, with floral trim and comfortable elasticised waist. Perfect for any occassion, she 'll love dressing up in this!

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Pleated Skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: This pleated above the knee skirt from Versatil, made with a wrinkle-resistent polyester-rayon blend, is pretty and practical. The elastic waist band makes the skirt comfortable to move around in.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Tiered Denim Skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: With its tiered shape, this Albini casual skirt has a pretty, feminine charm that is positively adorable. The pre-washed denim is easy to clean and stands up well to wear.

catentdesc.name: Albini Tots Girls' Denim Overall Dress
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' denim overall dress with large pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: She 'll be all set for school in this classic Albini denim overall dress. Colorful shoulder straps and metal clasps make this a stylish and practical choice that is easy to accesserize.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Girls' Lacy Dress
catentdesc.longdescription: With delicate lace around the neckline, this Hermitage dress has just the right touch of femininity for those special occassions. The sheer polyester outer layer is lined with 100% cotton, so it feels soft and comfortable.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' Pleated Tartan Skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Tartan with a twist! A layered tulle underskirt gives this tartan skirt a full look that is absolutely adorable. A smart look for a smart girl! Zipper at back.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Girls' A-Line Wrap-Around Skirt
catentdesc.longdescription: Smart, practical wrap-around skirt, with pleats at the back and a classic A-line shape. An elastic band waist makes this skirt a comfortable choice for everyday wear.
